dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HRES 22 EH:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: In the House of Representatives, U. S.,

section.text: That the following named Members be, and are hereby, elected to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. DelBene (to rank immediately after Mr. McGovern), Mr. Nolan, Mr. Gallego, Mr. Enyart, Mr. Vargas, Mrs. Bustos, and Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York.
Mr. Carson of Indiana (to rank immediately after Mr. Barber).
Mr. McDermott (to rank immediately after Ms. Castor of Florida), Mr. Jeffries, Mr. Pocan, Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico, Mr. Huffman, and Mr. Cárdenas.
Ms. Meng, Ms. Frankel of Florida, Ms. Gabbard, and Mr. Castro of Texas.
Mr. Vela, Mr. Horsford, and Mr. Swalwell of California.
Mr. Gutierrez (to rank immediately after Mr. Deutch).
Ms. Shea-Porter, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Garcia, and Mr. Cartwright.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform:
Committee on Science, Space, and Technology:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Maffei, Mr. Grayson, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Peters of California, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Bera, Ms. Esty, Mr. Veasey, Ms. Brownley of California, and Mr. Takano.
Ms. Hahn (to rank immediately after Ms. Chu), Mr. Payne (to rank immediately after Ms. Hahn), and Mr. Schneider.
Ms. Titus, Mrs. Kirkpatrick, Mr. Ruiz, Mrs. Negrete McLeod, Ms. Kuster, and Mr. O'Rourke.
